mapper.select: SELECT rnum, r.recipe_comment_id, r.recipe_comment_content, r.member_email, m.member_nick, r.recipe_comment_date FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY recipe_comment_date desc) AS rnum, recipe_comment_id, recipe_comment_content, recipe_comment_date, member_email FROM recipe_comment where recipe_board_id = #{recipeBoardId} ) r INNER JOIN member m ON r.member_email = m.member_email WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{pagination.startRowNumber} AND #{pagination.endRowNumber} ORDER BY rnum
select count(*) from recipe_comment where recipe_board_id=#{value}
